articles.title: General Staff of KPA Issues Crucial Notice
articles.content:
General Staff of KPA Issues Crucial Notice
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The General Staff of the Korean People's Army issued the following crucial notice Thursday:
					 The top-class servants of the puppet ministries of Defence, Unification and Foreign Affairs and Trade buckled down all at once to putting into practice the scenario for confrontation with fellow countrymen already worked out by them after traitor Lee Myung Bak declared it as a "state policy" to escalate all-out confrontation with the DPRK in his May 24 "statement to the people".
					
					 Such movement of the group of traitors is an act of totally scrapping the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the programme for implementing it, gains common to the nation, and a hideous criminal act of driving the north-south relations to the state of war.
					
					 As the group of traitors dared preempt all-out confrontation with the DPRK, the KPA General Staff informs it in strong terms that the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will put into practice crucial measures to cope with such action.
					
					1. The KPA will retract all measures for providing military guarantees for the north-south cooperation and exchange.
					
					 It will start examining the closure of the military communications liaison offices in the eastern and western coastal areas and the total suspension of the overland passage concerning the Kaesong Industrial Zone, etc. for the present.
					
					2. As for the anti-DPRK psychological campaign which the puppet military is set to resume, merciless counteractions will be taken throughout the frontline areas as the commander of the forces of the KPA in the central sector of the front had already warned the enemy side.
					
					3. Bilateral agreements concluded to prevent accidental conflicts in the West Sea of Korea will be declared completely null and void. 
					
					 In this connection the use of international maritime ultra-shortwave walkie-talkie will be banned and the communications line which has been in service to handle an emergency situation be immediately cut off.
					
					4. The KPA will make a prompt physical strike at the intrusion into the extension of the Military Demarcation Line under our side's control in the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 5. It will totally ban the passage of warships, airplanes and other means of transportation of the group of traitors through the territorial waters, air and land of the DPRK.
					
					 6. It will strictly ban the entry of the group of traitors including the puppet authorities into the DPRK.
					
					 7. It will probe the truth about the "fabrication" and "charade" to the last as long as the group of traitors persistently refuses to receive the inspection group of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					
					 The above-said steps are the first-phase reaction of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK to the reckless moves of the group of traitors, confrontation maniacs, sycophants and quislings to escalate the showdown with it. 
					
					 The group will come to keenly realize what dear price it will have to pay for having completely scrapped the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Blocking Joint Event
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Blocking Joint Event
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration released a statement Thursday denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors of south Korea for committing such intolerable crime as blocking the event common to the nation marking the tenth anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, despite the unanimous aspiration and desire of all the fellow countrymen for the independent reunification and peace of the country.
					 The statement recalled that it was agreed upon at the meeting of the chairmen of the north, the south and overseas committees of the All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration to hold a grand and significant reunification event common to the nation on the occasion of the tenth anniversary of the historic June 15 joint declaration and a series of working contacts held later chose Pyongyang as its venue and discussed all matters ranging from the contents of the event to its detailed program and the arrangements for it  have since been actively pushed forward. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 But the puppet group of traitors, displeased with the projected event from the day it was proposed, made every sinister effort to scuttle the meeting of the above-said committee and its working contacts for making preparations for the event. It went the lengths of totally blocking the participation of representatives of the south side in the Pyongyang event, thus preventing the north, south and overseas sides from holding the above-mentioned event.
					
					 Rushing headlong into the moves for a reckless war in collusion with foreign forces, the group is kicking up with bloodshot eyes the anti-DPRK smear campaign, crying out for "resolute steps" after groundlessly linking the sinking of a warship of the puppet army with it. 
					
					 The puppet group has wantonly trampled down upon the precious achievements gained by the Koreans through their concerted efforts under the banner of "By our nation itself" over the past decade since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, put an end to even the events for reunification common to the nation and brought the dark clouds of a war to hang over the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The group is frantically suppressing patriotic forces of the reunification movement with the "elections to the local self-governing bodies" just at hand and making desperate efforts to tide over the crisis through the fabricated warship case, but all this will only precipitate its self-destruction.
					
					 Those seeking war and confrontation with their backs turned on the nation are fated to meet a miserable end.

articles.title: Hatred against S. Korean Regime Runs High
articles.content:
Hatred against S. Korean Regime Runs High
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The Korean people have been indignant at the anti-DPRK confrontation escalated by the south Korean puppets since the sinking of their warship "Cheonan".
					Ri Un Chon, 45, a department director of the Ministry of Metal Industry, told KCNA that the Lee Myung Bak regime made public false "results of investigation" into the incident to mislead public opinion inside and outside and isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 Accusing the regime of trying to inflict a nuclear war holocaust upon the Korean nation, he said the Korean workers, who have gained in strength under the Songun politics, show no mercy to the enemy.
					
					 They are resolved to annihilate the aggressors to defend leader Kim Jong Il and the socialist system if the enemy dare to invade the DPRK, he said, adding:
					
					 The south Korean regime's foolish attempt to impede the advance of the DPRK will only make the Korean workers harden their resolve.
					
					 Kim Yong Chol, 37, a section chief of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said in an interview with KCNA:
					
					 The spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission declared in a statement that the DPRK will counter the enemy's reckless "counteraction" with an all-out war of justice. It is a legitimate step to safeguard the headquarters of the revolution and defend the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people from the aggressive moves of the warmongers.
					
					 The DPRK has a heroic Korean People's Army, equipped with powerful attack and defense means, and an invincible might of the people closely united in mind.
					
					 The south Korean regime will surely have to pay dearly for its clumsy ploy against the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 Kim Hyok, 28, a student of Kim Il Sung University, lambasted the south Korean regime for trying to bring the afore-said incident to the United Nations Security Council with the backing of the United States and Japan to hurt the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Ethiopian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Ethiopian President
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greetings to Girma Wolde-Giorgis, President of Ethiopia, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Ethiopia would continue to develop, Kim in the message wished the Ethiopian people greater success in their efforts for progress and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: "Echo of Mountain" Performed in Sariwon
articles.content:
"Echo of Mountain" Performed in Sariwon
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The performance of light comedy "Echo of Mountain", a winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, is going on before full houses in Sariwon, North Hwanghae Province, since May 25.
					 The comedy gives vivid artistic representation of the devoted struggle and the worthwhile life of agricultural workers in a mountainous area, who turned out in the efforts to increase the grain production and turn the socialist countryside into a paradise, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of agriculture.
					
					 The performers well represented through joyful laughing and nimble jests the noble spiritual world, sublime ideal and indomitable struggle of the pace-setters of the elder generation who worked hard for prosperity of the country, displaying their patriotic enthusiasm.
					
					 The performance was appreciated by officials of party, power and administrative and economic organs and working people of different strata in the province.
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: New Coal Fields Discovered
articles.content:
New Coal Fields Discovered
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The Kangdong Area Coal Mining Complex of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has discovered new coal fields to boost the coal production in a far-sighted way.
					 Deposited in the area are hundreds of millions of tons of high caloric coal.
					
					 The complex has concentrated efforts on securing more coal reserves and promising colliery sites in order to meet the ever growing demand for coal. 
					
					 Recently, the Kangdong and Hukryong coal prospecting corps found out new coal fields with deposits of hundreds of thousands of tons. 
					
					 Han Pok Jin, chief engineer of the Kangdong Coal Prospecting Corps, told KCNA that it is likely to discover more coal fields in the area.
					
					 The complex embraces Ryongnam, Toksan and other coal mines.

articles.title: Beer Popular among Koreans
articles.content:
Beer Popular among Koreans
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The technological updating of the Taedonggang Beer Factory here has made rapid progress, doubling its production capacity as compared with that at its outset. As a result, both draft beer and bottled beer are now being supplied to the capital city and various provinces on a regular basis. 
					 The factory built in Juche 91 (2002) set up several more fermentation and storing tanks and the process for the production of hop granules as required by the new century. It is also fitted with nitrogen generation and barley sorting and other equipment.
					
					 It developed new varieties of beer and built a new intermediary process to improve its quality. Best quality beer of new varieties such as peculiar rice beer and black beer have been developed and production and management are fully controlled by computers.
					
					 Taedonggang beer has reached the world standard in terms of more than 10 universally recognized quality indices and storage including hygienic security, alcohol, color and purity. 
					
					 It received a certificate of ISO 9001 in 2008.
					
					 Taedonggang beer is popular among Koreans for making the drinkers cool and refreshing and for its high degree of fermentation and mildness and pure and peculiar taste.
					
					 More than 150 beer parlors in different parts of Pyongyang are alive with customers everyday.

articles.title: Sisters Dreaming of Becoming Famous Artists
articles.content:
Sisters Dreaming of Becoming Famous Artists
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) - Han Su Mi (19) and Han Pyol Mi (17) are sisters who desire to be famous artists.
					 They are studying at Pyongyang University of Fine Arts, the elder in the fourth year and the younger in the first year. They presented several art pieces, including Korean painting "Azalea," to the world juvenile art festival held in India in June six years ago to be awarded the silver prize.
					
					 The elder sister won the silver cup at the Pyongyang art festival held in commemoration of the 90th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the special skill prize at the national contest of members of fine art groups held to celebrate the 50th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					The younger sister came first at a national contest of members of art and calligraphic groups of schoolchildren's palaces and took the top prize at the first national pencil drawing festival celebrating the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, February 16.
					
					 The number of the trophies, diplomas and medals they have won so far totals more than 20.
					
					 Each of the sisters has her own individuality in sketching.
					
					 The elder is characterized by vivid and detailed description of figure and landscape, while the younger by sharp observation of objects and delicate and three-dimensional representation.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Campaign Termed Open Declaration of War
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Campaign Termed Open Declaration of War
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The reckless campaign kicked off by the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea over its warship sinking is the unpardonable worst provocation and an open declaration of a war against the DPRK in the light of its sinister purposes, observes Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a signed commentary. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The group of traitors' assertion that the warship was sunken by "a torpedo attack of the north" is a sheer farce reminiscent of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 The puppet group is blustering that the DPRK "should pay for the case" but it is the arch criminal who should pay for what happened and deserve punishment because it spawned such hideous case, branding fellow countrymen as criminals through plots and fabrications, and brought the inter-Korean relations to a collapse. Nevertheless, it is groundlessly laying the blame for the case at the DPRK's door and kicking off confrontation hysteria. This is nothing but a brigandish behavior. 
					
					 Tightened "sanctions" against the DPRK much touted by the group are a reckless behavior that can be done only by those who are keen to ignite a war. 
					
					 The Lee group made an extremely reckless option to stifle the DPRK through cooperation with foreign forces despite all Koreans' protest and denunciation and repeated warnings of the DPRK, thus declaring an all-out confrontation with it and threatening that south Korea would "not rule out a war against it." 
					
					 Now that the puppet group challenged the DPRK formally and blatantly, the DPRK will react to confrontation with confrontation and to a war with an all-out war. 
					
					 The group of traitors should bear deep in mind that should it misunderstand the DPRK's will and continue going reckless, this will entail unheard-of disastrous consequences, warns the commentary.

articles.title: S. Korea's Refusal to Receive NDC Inspection under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea's Refusal to Receive NDC Inspection under Fire 
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities have persistently refused to receive an inspection group of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, asserting that "a scientific and objective investigation conducted by Korean and foreign experts finally confirmed that the ship Cheonan was sunken by a torpedo attack of the north."
					 In this regard Minju Joson Thursday says in a signed commentary:
					
					 The puppet authorities desperately refused to receive the inspection group because they are not in a position to produce before the inspection group material evidence proving that the warship was sunken by "the north's torpedo attack." 
					
					 Even after the publication of the "results of investigation", experts and other people of south Korea asserted that the warship ran against a rock, putting forward understandable reasons for it. The puppet authorities threatened those who asserted so and now have gone the lengths of working to punish such people on the charge of "spreading groundless rumors." This, however, only results in bringing to light the inside story about the farce orchestrated by them. 
					
					 A liar has short wings and a gimlet protruding from a sack cannot be hidden. The truth behind the farce will become clearer as the days go by. The Lee Myung Bak group will certainly be forced to pay for having cooked up the shocking case as part of its smear campaign against the DPRK to bring the inter-Korean relations to a collapse and increase the danger of a new war, a nuclear war.

articles.title: Earlier Final Victory in Building Thriving Nation Called for
articles.content:
Earlier Final Victory in Building Thriving Nation Called for
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday editorially calls for further increasing the speed of advance in the general offensive in the same spirit as displayed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il in making a forced march.
					 The editorial says:
					
					 The above-said spirit is the great revolutionary spirit with which Kim Jong Il is bringing into brilliant reality the intention and desire of President Kim Il Sung who dedicated himself to the country and its people all his life despite snow and rain and the persevering spirit of offensive of the brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu that one is sure to emerge victorious in every battle and should unconditionally carry out whatever one determines to do.
					
					 And it is the spirit of the harmonious whole based on his ardent comradeship and trust in the army and people and the noble patriotic spirit displayed by him in demonstrating the might of the country before the world and bringing boundless happiness to the Korean people.
					
					 Everything should be done the way the President did and every effort should be made to realize all his desires and ideas. This is the fundamental spirit fully displayed during Kim Jong Il's indefatigable forced march.
					
					 The remarkable speed of advance of the DPRK, which dashes toward the world while giving full play to the tremendous potential built in the crucible of Songun, constitutes a brilliant embodiment of Kim Jong Il's spirit of offensive and spirit of uninterrupted revolution. 
					
					 Thanks to the forced march of Kim Jong Il who has shown all loving care and benevolence for the servicepersons and people, undergoing every difficulty and hardship, the single-minded unity of the DPRK has remarkably grown stronger and astonishing miracles are reported from every part of the country. 
					
					 The DPRK is demonstrating its dignity as a satellite launcher of global level and such miracles as pushing back the frontiers of the latest science are being worked one after another in different parts of the country. This would be unthinkable without the above-said spirit of Kim Jong Il who is tirelessly working heart and soul, running against the time. 
					
					 The editorial calls on everybody to give fuller play to the spirit of effecting a great revolutionary surge true to the leadership of the great party and bring earlier the final victory in the drive for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: S. Korea Urged to Open Information about Warship Case
articles.content:
S. Korea Urged to Open Information about Warship Case
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and public organizations of various circles in south Korea on May 24 urged the puppet authorities to clarify patent information about the sinking of warship "Cheonan".
					 They accused the authorities of failing to produce such information as navigation record which helps accurately probe the cause of the warship sinking.
					
					 They charged that the authorities have not yet opened to the public the animation file showing what happened the moment the warship sank under the pretext of keeping "military secret", adding that they have not produced any material evidence proving that the fragments, they claimed were retrieved from the waters where the case took place, are those of a torpedo of the DPRK.
					
					 The "results of investigation" still remain skeptical, they noted, demanding that the authorities open to the public information about the case as early as possible.

articles.title: Int'l Solidarity Demanding Settlement of Japan's Past Meets
articles.content:
Int'l Solidarity Demanding Settlement of Japan's Past Meets
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- A coordinating meeting of the International Solidarity Council Demanding Settlement of Japan's Past was held in Hong Kong on May 15 and 16.
					 Present there were a delegation of the DPRK Committee on Measures for Former Korean "Comfort Women" for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims and delegations and delegates of organizations demanding the settlement of Japan's past from China, Japan and other countries and regions.
					
					 Discussed at the meeting were issues arising in conducting a vigorous solidarity movement to give further momentum to building up the worldwide public opinion demanding the full settlement of the crimes committed against humanity by the Japanese imperialists in the past this year that sees the lapse of 65 years after the Japanese imperialists' defeat and the lapse of 100 years after the illegal "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" was cooked up.
					
					 The meeting set the period from July 15 to August 15 as "month of international joint action for demanding Japan's redemption of its past" and decided to vigorously conduct in the period such actions as stirring up the concern and opinion of the international community over Japan's redemption of its past crimes against humanity and strongly urging the Japanese government to take a practical measure for the settlement of Japan's past. It discussed the issues to hold a meeting to listen to victims' testimonies, conduct the work of laying bare through media the crimes against humanity committed by Japan, stage protest actions outside the Japanese embassies and mass signature campaigns and launch the brisk activities calling for guaranteeing the Korean children in Japan the national educational rights and investigating the cultural assets looted by the Japanese imperialists in the past and returning them to countries to which they originally belonged, the issue to hold an annual meeting of the solidarity council and other issues.

articles.title: Korean Fine Art Exhibition Opened in Austria
articles.content:
Korean Fine Art Exhibition Opened in Austria
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- A Korean fine art exhibition was opened with due ceremony at an Austrian Museum of Applied Art, Vienna on May 18.
					On display in the venue of the exhibition were fine art pieces showing the wise guidance, immortal exploits and noble popular personality of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, Korean paintings, oil paintings, watercolors and posters dealing with the true picture of Songun Korea, a large panoramic map of Pyongyang City, a model of the Tower of the Juche Idea, photos of large monumental edifices and others.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony of the exhibition were personages of the Ministry of Education and Culture, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Chamber of Economy, the Presidential Office, the Prime Minister's Office, the museum and the newspaper Der Standard of Austria. Also present were diplomatic envoys of various countries to Austria, the DPRK ambassador to Austria and his embassy officials and others.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The curator of the museum expressed pleasure over the holding of the large-scale Korean fine art exhibition.
					
					 Saying that the exhibition would contribute to promoting understanding and developing friendly ties between the peoples of the two countries which have different political system, ideological sentiment and cultural tradition, the curator stressed that the exhibition would help many people know about the DPRK.

articles.title: NDC Spokesman's Statement Hailed in India
articles.content:
NDC Spokesman's Statement Hailed in India
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association issued a statement on May 21 in support of the statement issued by a spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The grave situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula owing to the sinking of warship "Cheonan" of the south Korean puppet navy, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities announced the "results of investigation" cooked up by them which assert that the warship was sunken by torpedo attack by the DPRK. And they are now crying out for "punishment" and "retaliation" against the DPRK and foolishly seeking even to prod the international community into applying additional "sanctions" against it. 
					
					 We bitterly denounce the south Korean puppet forces for their trite trick whereby they fake up a shocking case and use it for building public opinion about "north wind" whenever they find themselves in a crisis. We also vehemently condemn the U.S. and Japanese aggressors for working hard to keep the hostile policy toward the DPRK on its orbit while chiming in with their south Korean stooges.
					
					 We fully support the statement issued by a spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission and strongly urge the south Korean authorities to sincerely accept it and make efforts for peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The French Group for the Study of the Juche and Songun Idea, too, issued a statement on May 20 denouncing the south Korean puppet group's "results of investigation" into the case of sinking of "Cheonan".

articles.title: EMG publica aviso importante frente a la campana anti-RPDC
articles.content:
EMG publica aviso importante frente a la campana anti-RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea publico el dia 27 el siguiente aviso importante:
					En su llamada "declaracion al pueblo" pronunciada el pasado dia 24, el traidor Lee Myung Bak proclamo como "politica estatal" el enfrentamiento total con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Seguidamente, los cabecillas de los Ministerios titeres de Defensa Nacional, de Reunificacion y de Relaciones Exteriores y de Comercio procedieron simultaneamente a poner en practica el ya elaborado guion de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					  Este movimiento de la banda de traidores quiebra totalmente la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, conquista comun de la nacion, y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programa para la implementacion de la primera, siendo el crimen supergrande que lleva al estado de guerra las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					  Ya que la camarilla de traidores se atrevio a dar primero los pasos de enfrentamiento total con la RPDC, el Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea notifica solemnemente que seran implementadas las importantes contramedidas practicas de estas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					Primero, cancelara por completo todas las medidas de garantia militar que debe cumplir nuestro ejercito para la cooperacion y el intercambio entre el Norte y el Sur. 
					
					  Por ahora, comenzara a examinar el cierre de la oficina de comunicaciones militares en las zonas costeras orientales y occidentales y el bloqueo total del transito terrestre relacionado con la Zona Industrial de Kaesong y otros proyectos.
					
					Segundo, respondera implacablemente en todo el frente a la campana de guerra psicologica anti-RPDC, que quiere reanudar el ejercito titere, como ya habia advertido a la parte enemiga nuestro comandante del frente central.
					
					  Tercero, invalidara totalmente el acuerdo bilateral concertado para prevenir los choques accidentales en el Mar Oeste de Corea.
					
					  Para este fin, interrumpira el uso del radio- comunicador por onda ultracorta, que se usa internacionalmente en el mar, y sera cortada inmediatamente la linea de comunicacion inaugurada para gestionar los casos de emergencia.
					
					Cuarto, se dara de inmediato el golpe fisico si suceden los casos de invasion de la linea de demarcacion militar de nuestra parte en el Mar Oeste de Corea.
					
					  Quinto, prohibira totalmente el paso de los buques, aviones y otros vehiculos de la camarilla de traidores por el mar, el cielo y el territorio jurisdiccionales de nuestra parte.
					
					  Sexto, prohibira con rigor el acceso de la camarilla de traidores, inclusive las autoridades titeres, al interior de la RPDC.
					
					  Septimo, mientras prosiga el rechazo al grupo de inspeccion de nuestro Comite de Defensa Nacional, revelara hasta el final la esencia de la "farsa" y el "complot".
					
					  Estas medidas resultan la reaccion primaria de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias frente a la imprudente campana conflictiva con la RPDC de la banda de traidores, maniacos de enfrentamiento y vendepatrias serviles a grandes potencias.
					
					  Esta camarilla sentira en carne propia cuan caras le van a costar las consecuencias de la invalidacion total de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.

articles.title: Banda de Lee Myung Bak impide acto conjunto nacional por 15 de Junio
articles.content:
Banda de Lee Myung Bak impide acto conjunto nacional por 15 de Junio
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Comite Norteno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio hizo publica el dia 27 una declaracion condenando a la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak que en desafio a la unanime aspiracion de toda la nacion coreana a la reunificacion independiente y la paz del pais, volvio a cometer el imperdonable crimen anti-reunificacion de impedir el acto conjunto nacional en homenaje al decimo aniversario de la publicacion de ese documento intercoreano.
					  En la reunion de los presidentes de los comites del Norte, el Sur y ultramar del Comite Conjunto Nacional para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio se acordo organizar de manera solemne y significativa el acto conjunto nacional por la reunificacion, precisa la nota y prosigue:
					
					  Marcharon en etapa crucial los preparativos segun los resultados de los posteriores contactos de trabajo en que Pyongyang fue escogida como sede del acto y fueron consultados todos los problemas como el contenido y la agenda detallada del acto.
					
					  Disgustada desde el principio de la celebracion del acto, la camarilla de titeres surcoreanos maniobro de una manera u otra para frustrar la reunion y los contactos de trabajo y desautorizo al fin y al cabo la participacion de los delegados surcoreanos en el acto de Pyongyang.
					
					  De esta manera, ya se hizo imposible celebrar mas actos conjuntos nacionales en que tomaran parte los delegados del Norte, el Sur y de ultramar.
					
					  Ahora, la banda traidora, que se precipita hacia la aventurera guerra en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas, libra mas freneticamente la campana intrigante anti-RPDC vinculandola absurdamente con el hundimiento del buque surcoreano y hablando de la supuesta "medida resuelta".
					
					  Debido a ella, fueron invalidados los preciosos exitos del 15 de Junio logrados en 10 anos pasados por todos los coreanos bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" e interrumpidos hasta los actos conjuntos nacionales por la reunificacion y se cierne el nubarron de guerra sobre la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Ahora cuando se aproximan las "elecciones de autonomia local", la banda traidora maniobra mas freneticamente para reprimir a las fuerzas patrioticas del movimiento de reunificacion y realizan esfuerzos desesperados por salir de la crisis inventando el incidente de hundimiento del buque de guerra.
					
					  Pero, esta conducta le adelantara solo su autodestruccion.
					
					  Los tipejos, que persiguen la guerra y la confrontacion dando espaldas a la nacion, no podran evitar el tragico fin.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia declaracion de guerra de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia declaracion de guerra de titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ATCC) -- El siniestro objetivo con que actua imprudentemente la banda de Lee Myung Bak con respecto al incidente de hundimiento de su buque de guerra significa imperdonable y peor desafio a la RPDC y abierta declaracion de guerra.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este jueves y continua:
					
					Parte de la logica de bandido la insistencia de los titeres surcoreanos en que el "Norte fue el autor" de hundimiento del buque del ejercito titere surcoreano.
					
					Ahora la banda de traidores sostiene que la RPDC "debe pagarlo". Pero el criminal verdadero que tiene que pagarlo y ser castigado es la misma banda surcoreana que fabrico tal incidente de gran tamano y rompio totalmente las relaciones N-S acriminando con intrigas y fraudes a la connacional RPDC. 
					
					A pesar de esto, los titeres imputaron finalmente a la RPDC la responsabilidad del incidente y se muestran mas conflictivos con ella hablando de la intensificacion de la "sancion".
					
					Esto es la locura que puede ocurrir solo a los que ya decidieron hacer la guerra.
					
					A pesar de la protesta y la condenacion de toda la nacion coreana y la repetida advertencia de la RPDC, la banda de Lee escogio la opcion sumamente aventurera de aplastar a la RPDC en "cooperacion" con las fuerzas extranjeras arrojando asi el guante a esta para el enfrentamiento total y la guerra.
					
					Puesto que los titeres desafian oficial y gravemente a la RPDC, esta respondera al enfrentamiento con el enfrentamiento y a la guerra con la guerra total.
					
					Si la banda de traidores actua imprudentemente juzgando mal la voluntad de la RPDC, sufrira consecuencias ruinosas.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica negativa al grupo de inspeccion del CDN
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica negativa al grupo de inspeccion del CDN
						
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ATCC) -- Los titeres surcoreanos se obstinan en inaceptar al grupo de inspeccion del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea aduciendo que fue "confirmada definitivamente" por la "investigacion cientifica y objetiva de los especialistas nacionales y extranjeros" que el buque "Cheonan" fue "hundido por el ataque de torpedo norcoreano". 
					Al respecto, el periodico Minju Joson publico este jueves un comentario individual.
					
					La obstinada negativa de los titeres surcoreanos al grupo de inspeccion del CDN se debe a que ellos no pueden presentar ante este grupo la innegable prueba material del "ataque de torpedo norcoreano" que segun ellos fue la causa del incidente, senala el comentario y prosigue:
					
					Aun despues de publicado el "resultado de investigacion", los expertos y habitantes surcoreanos siguen sosteniendo con argumentos persuasivos que el buque sufrio la varada. 
					
					Al cabo de chantajear a los hombres de tal criterio, los titeres surcoreanos tratan ahora de ejecutarlos acusando de "difundir rumores falsos". Pero, esta represion sirve solo para poner al desnudo esa farsa inventada por los mismos titeres.
					
					Como no hay mentira eterna, esa marana anti-RPDC sera esclarecida cada dia mas en detalles. 
					
					La banda de Lee Myung Bak pagara muy caro su crimen de haber colapsado las relaciones Norte-Sur y agravado el peligro de la nueva guerra nuclear al inventar el sensacional incidente del "Cheonan" para calumniar a la RPDC.

articles.title: Pueblo coreano condena campana anti-RPDC de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Pueblo coreano condena campana anti-RPDC de titeres surcoreanos
  Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ATCC) -- Hace vibrar de odio al pueblo coreano la conducta de los titeres surcoreanos que endurecen en estos dias su campana conflictiva con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pronunciando disparates provocativos con motivo del incidente de hundimiento del buque "Cheonan".
					  El director de departamento del Ministerio de Industria Metalurgica Ri Un Chon, de 45 anos de edad, dijo a la ATCC que son fanaticos de guerra nuclear los compinches del traidor Lee Myung Bak que actuan locamente para aislar y aplastar a la RPDC enganando a la opinion publica interna y externa con el manipulado "resultado de investigacion" del incidente del "Cheonan" de la marina de guerra surcoreana.
					
					  Es implacable nuestro martillo de hierro forjado cien veces en virtud de la politica de Songun, afirmo y agrego que el pueblo coreano exterminara de un solo golpe a los agresores defendiendo al Dirigente     Kim Jong Il y el regimen socialista.
					
					  El estupido complot de la banda del traidor Lee, que pretende frenar la impetuosa marcha de la Corea del Songun en gran auge revolucionario, no da otro resultado que centuplicar la fe, la voluntad y el coraje de nuestra clase obrera de la rama de industria metalurgica, concluyo.
					
					  El jefe de seccion del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Kim Yong Chol, de 37 anos de edad, hizo las siguientes declaraciones:
					
					  La declaracion del portavoz del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, de que responderia con la justa guerra total a la imprudente "reaccion" de los enemigos, es la mas justa medida de autodefensa para defender a costa de vida a la Direccion de la Revolucion, la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo desde las maniobras agresivas de los belicistas.
					
					  Somos jovenes coreanos que toman firmemente el baton de la revolucion que nos entregaron los martires revolucionarios.
					
					  Contamos con el heroico Ejercito Popular de Corea, que dispone de todos los potentes medios de ataque y defensa, y con el poderio de la unidad monolitica que no se puede romper ni con la bomba atomica.
					
					  El mundo vera bien cuan caro va a pagar la camarilla de traidores surcoreanos su complot y farsa ideados torpemente para aplastar a los connacionales.
					
					  El estudiante de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, Kim Hyok, de 28 anos de edad, critico a los titeres surcoreanos por tratar de llevar el asunto al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU con el apoyo de sus amos gringo y japones, y sentencio que no se puede perdonar nunca a la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak que actua con desesperacion para hacer dano a los connacionales con el apoyo de las fuerzas foraneas.
